name: Tomatos Farm
description:
Nice and chillin farming game

Nice to meet you. This is your new farm! Its autumn, so you have to harvest your crops. Wait, you didnt plant any crops yet? Holy moly that means you need to make this as fastest you can before season ends!

If you want you can share your score in the comments!

Controls

Arrows - move

X - equip items

C - drop items

Walk over the "icons" in the wolrd to buy/sell items.

Walk to the field to plant items (items are planted automaticly when you walk over the field with them)

Made for Autumn Game Jam 2021

Enjoy - Agama Labs
